text: "Burn for You" is a 1984 song by Australian new wave band INXS and is the third single from their fourth studio album The Swing. It went to number 3 in Australia and number 29 in New Zealand. ==Track listing== 7" single Track listing 12"/CD Maxi single Track listing == References == Category:1984 songs Category:INXS songs
title: Burn for You (INXS song)
